creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: Alter frontal of gold-colored cut out velvet.  Design of nine Foo dogs and thin sprays of bamboo.  The valance section ha two Foo Dogs flanking a lotus blossom.  Birder of valance and main panel is a wide Greek Key meander.  Lining of Pink cotton.
title: Panel, velvet
